title: RAGBRAI LI
text:
Hi, Goon Squad!
It’s your TC here (pictured below).

As you may know, I am an outdoor enthusiast and a logistical maniac. What does this mean? When it comes to big excursions and I am put in charge of things… we get a website. Welcome to ours!
All information on this site aligns with official RAGBRAI rules and publications while including additional tips, suggestions, and plans unique to us, Goon Squad.
Please peruse this site and let me know at any point if there is something you’d like to see here that is currently absent. Also, keep using our group chat to ask questions about anything ride-related. That is what teammates and I are here for.
That’s all for now.
Ride on,
Maddi
Team Captain (TC)
Graduate Student (GS)
Graduate Instructor (GI)
Mostly vegan (MV)
RStudio geek (RSG)
Not a huge cyclist tbh, I mostly run, but here for the good time (NAHCTBHIMRBHFTGT)

title: RAGBRAI LI
text:
These lists are based on various sources with multiple packing philosophies, but one rings consistent: minimalism.
Our SAG Wagons will transport all your stuff from campsite to campsite. Considering SAG’s limited vehicle space as well as your own sanity (trust me!), please pack discerningly.
Pros suggest packing everything you think you’ll need, then coming back a few days later to pare it down significantly. Some even encourage riders to pack just two of each type of clothing and do some quick sink-laundry each night.
Rider Packing List
SAG Packing List

title: RAGBRAI LI
text:
If you don’t already know, I am an outdoor enthusiast and a planner to the nth extreme. What does this mean? When it comes to big excursions, I should never be given the proverbial clipboard. This is what happens when I get the proverbial clipboard.
Right now you’re looking at a website containing all things RAGBRAI LI, including information specific to us as an individual team. All information on this site aligns with official RAGBRAI rules and publications while including additional tips, suggestions, and plans unique to us, Goon Squad.
Let me know if there is anything else you’d like to see on this site, and I’ll see what I can do. Of course, please reach out when you have questions about anything ride-related! That is what I’m here for.
Take care an ride on,
Maddi
Goon Squad Team Captain (TC)
Graduate Student (GS)
Graduate Instructor (GI)
RStudio Maniac (RM)
Not a huge cyclist tbh, I mostly run, but here for the good time (NAHCTBHIMRBHFTGT)
